translations.translation: and made the mountains firm,
And stabilized the mountains
and firmly fixed in it mountains;
then set-up firmly the mountains.
And solidified the mountains.
And the mountains He has fixed firmly,
And the mountains, He made them firm,
and the mountains He set firm,
And He made fast the hills,
and making the mountains firm:
And the mountains! - He established them firm:
setting firm the mountains,
And the mountains hath He firmly fixed;-
And the mountains He has fixed firmly;
And the mountains He set firm
And the mountains, He anchored.
And the mountains He set firmly
[79:32] and has set firm the mountains, on the face of the earth so that it stays still,
And He made fast the hills) and He made the mountains firm,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا } معناه ثّبَّتَها في الأَرضِ
 فَجَعَلَهَا أوتاداً { مَتَاعاً لَّكُمْ [وَلأَنْعَامِكُمْ] } معناه رِزقٌ لَكُمْ ولأَنعِامِكُم

translations.translation:
And His saying, "And the mountains He has set firm" - its meaning is that He has firmly established them on the earth.


And He made it a provision for you {and for your livestock} - a means of sustenance for you and your livestock.
